name: Andex
overview:
ANDEX is a full-service professional staffing firm providing direct hire and staffing solutions for hiring organizations and career management for technical professionals across many industries. The company was founded in September of 1994 and our management has over 25 years of technical recruiting experience.

We offer the best and highest paying positions in Information Technology. Compensation typically ranges from $50,000 to $500,000+. We represent companies throughout the U.S; and Europe and Asia.

Our primary business is finding permanent and temporary positions for technical professionals . There is no charge for candidates; fees are paid by our client companies. We are fully licensed and insured.

Andexâ€™s Information Technology focus allows us to “target recruit” “sure fit” candidates for your open positions. We have worked in technical fields and hired technical people. Our staffing agency knows the challenges you face and our extensive screening process means you get quality people who have the skills you require.

Much care is taken in determining whether a candidate possesses the technical abilities, motivation and qualifications needed to succeed in your organization.

We specialize in placing professionals in mid, senior and executive level positions across many specialties including, technology, professional services, management consulting, sales, marketing and healthcare.

With an extensive network of professionals we are ready to serve you. To list a position with our firm, please email or fill out the form above with an overview of the position, qualification requirements, and a brief description of your company.

We are fully licensed and insured.
We find Both permanent employees and contract hires.
